articles.author: KTVU FOX 2
articles.title: 2 Asian women stabbed in San Francisco, suspect in custody - KTVU San Francisco
articles.description: Witnesses say the two women were waiting at a bus stop when a man carrying a knife attacked them at 4th and Market streets in the downtown area.
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO - San Francisco police arrested a suspect in a double stabbing that injured two Asian women on Tuesday evening.
One of the women is 85 years old. 
This attack appears to be unprovoked… [+761 chars]

articles.title: Not woke: Private club in Singapore 'incredibly sorry' for using George Floyd's murder as pop quiz material - AsiaOne
articles.description: Themes for pub nights can be anything under the sun, but what happens when the murder of African-American George Floyd gets used as material for a drinking game? Private club 1880 Singapore hit a nerve when members were quizzed on the details of the crime, as…
articles.content:

articles.title: Singapore moves on from Windows 7, mostly - Channel Asia Singapore
articles.description: ​Globally, 22 per cent of PC users continue to run the outdated Windows 7 operating system, but not in Singapore, where just 16 per cent of consumers and only 9.6 per cent of SMBs use the OS.
articles.content: Globally, 22 per cent of PC users continue to run the outdated Windows 7 operating system, but not in Singapore, where just 16 per cent of consumers and only 9.6 per cent of small- to medium-sized bu… [+4501 chars]

articles.title: Who's the daddy? J-pop star Ayumi Hamasaki gives birth to second child - AsiaOne
